title: The Updated Runeterra map finally revealed!
body:
http://i.imgur.com/llMzCVIh.jpg

Does this trigger you? 
Good.
Are you also a Rioter?
Great.
So can we have the actual updated map after two years now? 


(When I think about it now, I could've also put Bilgewater right next to Shurima and far away from the sea...)

replies.body:
Did you make this? Cause....

> [{quoted}](name=Kyoki Shinkuro,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BxXdu4Kj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-10T14:06:41.264+0000)
>
> SO... MUCH... INACCCURACY.
> 
> ARGH. WHY DOES THIS EVEN EXIST?

Everything what he just said.

They've done it on purpose.  To hurt me.  To make my eye twitch and to demand why there isn't a real Runeterra map out yet.

I'm pretty sure there is something in the Geneva Convention against this.

Their _real_ effort at a Runeterra map is [over in this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/oEJG5qIs-new-lore-runeterra-map-concept).  I suspect this one was using all that they had learned, and purposely doing the opposite.

To hurt me.

Grr.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} 

Well played, SBP. **Well.  Played**.

I'm like... so fricking flattered? 

Anyway did this thread really become this hilarious? Lol, I'm literally crying of laughter

This thread was actually made about an hour earlier actually.
Mkst likely a "fake" teaser, or just to get you all riled up for fun before getting serious {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
YOU ALSO TRICKED MEH
Some people just want to watch the world burn.
I think you missed the point.

SO... MUCH... INACCCURACY.

ARGH. WHY DOES THIS EVEN EXIST?
Especially since Piltover and Zaun are supposed to be separated by a river, damnit...
you have the void between demacia and shurima and you complain about a FUCKING RIVER?!
# Frejord is literally on the bottom of the map!!

#*THE SHADOW ISLES DO NOT EXIST*

Like, really, there' s the name but no island close to it

> [{quoted}](name=Decrit,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BxXdu4Kj,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-10T19:30:20.699+0000)
>
> #*THE SHADOW ISLES DO NOT EXIST*
> 
> Like, really, there' s the name but no island close to it

Well duh - they're made of shadow.  The clue's in the name.
######/s

i should ask the OP to put away the lamp so we can see the isles.

... or should i ask him/her to place a lamp so we can see the shadow?

**brain melting intensifies**
*him :P
hey, you name yourself sexy bisex plant so i get cautious with pronouns xD

I'm just making it clear xD Not that it could offend me or anything, but it's actually funny how much I'm asked about my name, even in games (and it's fun to make people sweat about the permaban for saying something offensive xDDD )
I like how the Void is just in the middle of the map. Like no f*cks given :'D
Is it wrong that I hate and love this at the same time?
I feel the same actually...
YOU TRICKED MEH

Shurima is next to the Freljord. Seems legit. Also Bandle city on the shadow isles.

Jesus christ... this is painful to look at compared to your other map...
But what about {{summoner:30}} ?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
